oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A note regarding the latter stars [named by !gaunu] was given by /han=kasso (L VIII.-13. 7119 rev.). About a rain called 'Aquilae's water' and about rain-clouds which resemble celestial bodies. 1) This story is found in Book VIII-13.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aquilae's water
